module.name: ap239_product_life_cycle_support
module.keywords: module, Product life cycle support, Integrated Logistic Support, Maintenance

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of product life cycle support. It provides a comprehensive capability to describe a set of products needing support and the work needed to sustain such products in an operational condition.

The module enables the creation and management through time of an Assured set of Product and Support Information (APSI) which can be used to specify and control required support activities throughout a product's life. This information is assumed to be subject to configuration change management to sustain the information needed to support the product in line with the changing product, over its full life cycle.

Capability is also provided to describe the resources required, provided and used to deliver support, and to record the history of the product usage, state and work done. This concept is illustrated by Figure
1 .

The module was developed to represent the data associated with complex engineering assets, such as aircraft, ships or weapon systems, which may exist either as a product design, or as an actual product. It can also be applied to much simpler products such a pump or an amplifier. The range of target products is shown by Figure
2 . The shaded area represents main industry focus for this module. This is characterized by complex high value products with long life cycles and demanding in-service support requirements.

Most of the capability provided by this module is contained in sub-ordinate modules. The top of the AP239 module hierarchy is shown in Figure
3 .
The specific capabilities added by this module is the collection of AP239 modules to a single root.

outscope.li: the representation of business transactions for orderings, supplying or transporting the resources needed for product support.

definition.term: Assured set of product and support information
definition.def: the set of information needed to develop and deliver support for a specific product that is subject to configuration change management.
the complete process of designing, manufacturing, operating and supporting a product, including its final disposal.
the support of a product throughout the product life cycle.

abbreviation.term: Assured set of Product and Support Information
